attributes.action: Intervene in Zimbabwe now please please
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recently watched in with tears what is happening in Zimbabwe. Why are you not doing anything? Who will do anything? please please help.Do you want half the population dead first? Please for God's sake do something.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
